Name: glued laminated timber production, average glue mix | glued laminated timber, average glue mix | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/16:Manufacture of wood and of products of wood and cork, except furniture; manufacture of articles of straw and plaiting materials/162:Manufacture of products of wood, cork, straw and plaiting materials/1621:Manufacture of veneer sheets and wood-based panels
Description: Most data from 4 Canadian mills, including 2 from Québec. The Québec mills account for 55% of the production from the surveyed mills. Some data taken from the GLO dataset. The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.
